biotools.summary: An R Package to Derive Confidence Intervals for Combinations of Independent Parameter Estimates. Uncertainty is propagated through by sampling from probability distributions for each estimate and then deriving an empirical interval containing 95% of the resulting distribution (either via highest density interval or quantiles).

bioschemas.name: bootComb
